mapper.select: SELECT M.no , M.email , M.pw , M.nm , M.role FROM (SELECT user_no as no , user_email as email , user_pw as pw , user_nm as nm , 'users' as role FROM users UNION SELECT admin_no as no , admin_email as email , admin_pw as pw , admin_nm as nm , 'admin' as role FROM admin UNION SELECT dc_no as no , dc_email as email , dc_pw as pw , dc_nm as nm , 'dc' as role FROM dress_company UNION SELECT mc_no as no , mc_email as email , mc_pw as pw , mc_nm as nm , 'mc' as role FROM makeup_company UNION SELECT sc_no as no , sc_email as email , sc_pw as pw , sc_nm as nm , 'sc' as role FROM studio_company) M WHERE email = #{email}
